com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d

Class GameCamera2d

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.GameCamera
      • com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.GameCamera2d

  • public class GameCamera2d
extends GameCamera
    A game camera that wraps an OrthographicCamera for rendering in 2D space.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.isoterik.mgdx.GameCamera

        camera, viewport, worldUnits

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new scene given a viewport and an instance of WorldUnits for unit conversions.
      GameCamera2d(WorldUnits worldUnits)
      Creates a new instance given an instance of WorldUnits for unit conversions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameCamera2d

        public GameCamera2d(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.viewport.Viewport viewport,
                    WorldUnits worldUnits)
        Creates a new scene given a viewport and an instance of WorldUnits for unit conversions. Note: an OrthographicCamera will be created.
        Parameters:
        viewport - the viewport
        worldUnits - an instance of WorldUnits

      • GameCamera2d

        public GameCamera2d(WorldUnits worldUnits)
        Creates a new instance given an instance of WorldUnits for unit conversions. The viewport defaults to an ExtendViewport.
        Parameters:
        worldUnits - an instance of WorldUnits

      • GameCamera2d

        public GameCamera2d()
        Creates a new scene. The screen dimensions defaults to (1280 x 720) taking 100 pixels per meter for unit conversions. The viewport defaults to an ExtendViewport.
